critique: The document is an executive order regarding the resumption of the U.S. Refugee Admissions Program (USRAP) with enhanced vetting procedures. It emphasizes national security and public safety concerns related to refugee entry, referencing past instances of terrorist infiltration and the need for thorough screening. While resuming the program, it also mandates ongoing assessments of risks posed by certain refugee categories and a report on the effect of refugee resettlement on national security.
